verbs.description: [ARG0: The Democratic Party] [V: sued] [ARG1: Donald Trump 's presidential campaign , Russia , WikiLeaks and Trump 's son and son - in - law] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] , [ARGM-ADV: accusing them of an intricate conspiracy to undercut Democrats in the 2016 election by stealing tens of thousands of emails and documents] .

[ARG0: The Democratic Party] sued Donald Trump 's presidential campaign , Russia , WikiLeaks and Trump 's son and son - in - law Friday , [V: accusing] [ARG1: them] [ARG2: of an intricate conspiracy to undercut Democrats in the 2016 election by stealing tens of thousands of emails and documents] .

The Democratic Party sued Donald Trump 's presidential campaign , Russia , WikiLeaks and Trump 's son and son - in - law Friday , accusing [ARG0: them] of an intricate conspiracy to [V: undercut] [ARG1: Democrats] [ARGM-LOC: in the 2016 election] [ARGM-MNR: by stealing tens of thousands of emails and documents] .

The Democratic Party sued Donald Trump 's presidential campaign , Russia , WikiLeaks and Trump 's son and son - in - law Friday , accusing [ARG0: them] of an intricate conspiracy to undercut Democrats in the 2016 election by [V: stealing] [ARG1: tens of thousands of emails and documents] .
